el-pollo-loco: Jump-and-run game based on object-oriented programming
pokedex: Pokémon encyclopedia based on RESTful API
about-text: “ I love to create solutions that provide value and have a beautiful design. If you do what you love, you will never have to work again ”
text1: became clear to me as I discovered my interest for IT in highschool. I signed up for a course called Multimedia, Design and Network management.
text2: as I did my research on programming and subscribed to multiple tech professionals on their social media plattforms.
text3: as I specialized on front-end development. I learned programming at Developer-Akademie in Munich, Germany.
text4: with the experience and confidence gained from building multiple high quality projects and completing 20+ modules.
